---
title: "Revoking access token"
description: "Revoke your access_token from gaining access to the API Resources"
---

<Card title="Revoke access token" icon="ban"
href="/nomba-api-reference/authenticate/revoke-an-access_token">
  Access this resource in the playground
</Card>

# `POST /auth/issue/revoke`

#### Request body

<ParamField body="clientId" type="string" required>
  The client's id as obtained from your Nomba dashboard
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="access_token" type="string" required>
  The JWT (Json Web Token) token to be revoked
</ParamField>

<RequestExample>
```bash Request
curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.nomba.com/v1/auth/token/revoke \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
  "clientId": "2242b79d-f2cf-4ccc-ada1-e890bd1a9f0d",
  "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..lQOsyhR1gajKdzE9IHQEtxhQyUrArctEDZiP9pWVTFY"
}'
```
</RequestExample>

<ResponseExample>
```json Success response
{
  "code": "00",
  "description": "Token revoked successfully"
}
```
</ResponseExample>
